name: photo-jumper
description: Photo Jumper - a PWA platform game that turns your photos into playable levels

scripts.cap:copy: rsync -a --delete --exclude='node_modules' --exclude='.git' --exclude='android' --exclude='www' --exclude='feedback' --exclude='tmp' --exclude='temp' --exclude='learning' --exclude='ejs-docs' --exclude='docs' --exclude='.github' --exclude='package-lock.json' --exclude='capacitor.config.ts' . www/ && npx cap copy android
scripts.cap:sync: npm run cap:copy && npx cap sync android
